description.value: As a Free Action, character can gain up to Toughness Bonus Fatigue, for each Fatigue gained, they add +1 to Damage and Penetration for all of their Integrated Weapons for WP Bonus Rounds.

system.benefit: As a Free Action, character can gain up to Toughness Bonus Fatigue, for each Fatigue gained, they add +1 to Damage and Penetration for all of their Integrated Weapons for WP Bonus Rounds.

prerequisites.text: T 40, WP 40, Implanted Potentia Coil or Mechanicus Implants, Integrated Weapon Expertise.
